t: Those*pn who trust in the Lord*s are like Mount Zion, which*ld cannot be moved, but abides forever.
As*ln the mountains surround Jerusalem, so*ld the Lord*s surrounds his people, from*ld this time forth and forevermore.
For*ln the scepter of wickedness shall not rest on*ld the land allotted to the righteous, lest*ln the righteous stretch out their*ld hands to do wrong.
Do*ln good, O Lord,*s to those who are good, and*ld to those who are upright in their hearts!
But*ln those who turn aside to their crooked ways the*ld Lord*s will lead away with evildoers! Peace*ld be upon Israel!
